title.narrative: Rio+20: CISU - support for civil society activities to support climate and environment

description.narrative: The aim of the grant is to engage and involve civil society in the planning, holding and follow-up to international processes on climate an environment such as the climate COP's and the Rio+20 follow-up processes. In order to secure a transparent and professional process an agreement has been reached with CISU (Civilsamfund i Udvikling) to administer a Climate and Environment Fund where Danish civil society organizations can apply for funding to activities in devleoping countries. The fund supports interventions between DKK 200,000 og 5 million with a focus on activities related to capacity building and specific advocacy on behalf of or together with poor and underrepresented target groups in the South, primarily linked to regional and international political and strategic development processes and negotiations on subjects regarding climate and environment. Applications under the Climate and Environment Fund will take place once a year namelyg 1 October.
